Content_wSideColumn.Name: Holiday Schedule
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Holiday Schedule

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Holiday Schedule for BYU-Idaho

2013 Paid Holidays

     New Year's Day . . . . . December 31, 2012 (Monday) and January 1, 2013 (Tuesday)
     Martin Luther King Jr./Idaho Human Rights Day . . . . . January 21 (Monday)
     President's Day . . . . . February 18 (Monday)
     Memorial Day . . . . . May 27 (Monday)
     Independence Day . . . . . July 4 (Thursday)
     Pioneer Day . . . . . July 24 (Wednesday)
     Labor Day . . . . . September 2 (Monday)
     Thanksgiving . . . . . November 28-29 (Thursday and Friday)
     Christmas . . . . . December 24-25 (Tuesday and Wednesday)

2014 Paid Holidays

     New Year's Day . . . . . December 31, 2013 (Tuesday) and January 1, 2014 (Wednesday)
     Martin Luther King Jr./Idaho Human Rights Day . . . . . January 20 (Monday)
     President's Day . . . . . February 17 (Monday)
     Memorial Day . . . . . May 26 (Monday)
     Independence Day . . . . . July 4 (Friday)
     Pioneer Day . . . . . July 24 (Thursday)
     Labor Day . . . . . September 1 (Monday)
     Thanksgiving . . . . . November 27-28 (Thursday and Friday)
     Christmas . . . . . December 25-26 (Thursday and Friday)

2015 Paid Holidays

     New Year's Day . . . . . January 1-2 (Thursday and Friday)
     TBA
